sen.j: もじりと呼ばれる武器を使った武術。
sen.e: It is a martial art using a weapon called mojiri (barbed staff).
Mojiri jutsu refers to a martial art using a weapon called mojiri.
sen.cmt: 文頭を一部補足しました。
sen.e: Mojiri jutsu refers to a martial art using a weapon called mojiri.

sen.j: もじりとは長柄の先に多くの鉄叉を上下につけた道具。
sen.e: Mojiri is an instrument of long shaft with many tessa (iron fork) at the tip, and tessa are pointing up and down.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処「柄の上下」と言う意味だと「長柄の先に」と矛盾してしますので、「多く」が上下を向いて、ととります。実際に鉄叉はさまざまな方向を向いているようです。
sen.e: Mojiri is an instrument of long shaft, at the tip of which is attached with many tessa (iron fork) which point up and down.
sen.cmt: 翻訳を一部補足しました。
sen.e: Mojiri is an instrument of long shaft, at the tip of which is attached with many tessa (iron fork) which point up and down.

sen.j: 江戸時代に罪人を捕える武器として用いられた。
sen.e: It is used as a weapon to catch criminals in Edo Period.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: It is used as a weapon to catch criminals during the Edo period.
sen.cmt: period 小文字にしました。
sen.e: It is used as a weapon to catch criminals during the Edo period.

sen.j: 日本の古武道武芸十八般の一つに数えられる。
sen.e: It is counted as one of Bugei Juhappan (18 skills of martial arts) in kobudo (classical material arts).
